translation.en: Dad, what are you doing?
Oh, uh, just makin' a movie. [Julia] Why?
[man] So we can remember. A day in the life.
[laughing] This is awesome!
What a day to remember!
The excitement was squishable
as the entire garden gathered to witness an amazing feat.
translation.ko: '온 마을이 곤충 스피드 기록을 깨는 묘기를 보려고'

translation.en: An attempt to break the bug speed record.
I love breaking stuff!
Oh, with my, uh, custom-made cricktoracer,
translation.ko: 나의 맞춤형 크릭토 경주 자동차를 타면

translation.en: you should go faster than any bug has ever gone before!
translation.ko: 지금까지 달린 그 어떤 곤충보다 더 빨리 달릴 거야!

translation.en: Let's do this!
Talk us through what you're doing here, Crick, in laybug's terms.
translation.ko: 어떻게 한 거야, 크릭 쉽게 얘기해 봐

translation.en: Ah! Well, I've installed a warning light,
uh, so when Jay reaches record-breaking speed,
translation.ko: 그래서 제이가 기록을 깨는 속도에 도달하면

translation.en: it will, uh, flash and the cricktocamera will cricktomatically take a picture.
translation.ko: 불이 켜지고 크릭토 카메라가 자동으로 사진을 찍을 거야

translation.en: Enough talking! Time for Jaction! That's Jay plus action!
translation.ko: 얘기 그만해, 잭션 시간이야 제이 더하기 액션!

translation.en: -[engine revving] -Kumi to Buzz. Kumi to Buzz.
[through radio] Kumi to Buzz, do you read? [Buzz] Wow.
translation.ko: - 버즈, 나와, 내 말 들려? - 우와!

translation.en: Kumi to Buzz, do you read? Oh! Um, I'm learning to read. Does that count?
translation.ko: - 버즈, 내 말 들려? - 나 듣고 있다, 이러면 돼?

translation.en: Sure, Buzz. Ah, Jay's about to go. Just checking that the coast is clear.
translation.ko: 그래, 버즈, 제이가 곧 간다 안전한지 확인바란다

translation.en: -Yes, the clear is coast! -[meows]
Okay, we are good to go!
Oh, my. I've got a bad feeling about this. I can't... I can't watch.
translation.ko: 저런, 예감이 좋지 않아 못 보겠어

translation.en: Now to make sure that record stays broken!
translation.ko: 이제 그 기록을 확실히 깨 주겠어!

translation.en: Um, Buzz to Kumi. Buzz to Kumi. The clear is not coast anymore!
translation.ko: 쿠미, 버즈다! 확인은 이제 안전하지 않다!

translation.en: Uh, Buzz, what do you mean?
-Jay! -[bugs gasp]
Jay! Are you okay?
I am, uh, more than okay. I am awesome!
Oh, Jay, are you okay?
Uh... Am I okay?
Uh, I'm gonna go with yes. I think.
translation.ko: 너희랑 같이... 그래, 그런 것 같아

translation.en: Well, you did it, Jay. You broke the record.
[laughing] What an achievement!
The bug speed record smashed! How does it feel, Jay?
translation.ko: 너무 잘했어! '곤충 스피드 기록'이 깨졌어! 기분이 어때, 제이?

translation.en: Wait. What did I smash?
Who is Jay? And, uh, who are all of you?
Uh, Dr. Robert, care to comment on Jay's memory loss?
translation.ko: 로버트 박사님 제이의 기억 상실에 대해 할 말씀하시겠어요?

translation.en: Well, uh, yes.
translation.ko: 아, 그래 뭐가 잘못된 건지 알아냈어

translation.en: I've discovered what is wrong with Jay, and it is nothing.
translation.ko: 아, 그래 뭐가 잘못된 건지 알아냈어 그건... 잘못된 게 없어

translation.en: [gasps] You heard it here first! It's... Wait. What?
translation.ko: 여기서 처음 들었다, 그건... 잠깐, 뭐라고요?

translation.en: At least nothing physically wrong.
All we can really do is wait and hope his memory returns.
translation.ko: 우리가 할 수 있는 건 기다리면서 기억이 돌아오길 바라는 거야

translation.en: Oh, I beg to differ, Mr. Doctor.
There is something we can do. [gasps] Make sure the world reads all about it.
translation.ko: 분명히 할 수 있는 게 있어요 세상에 그걸 알리는 거예요

translation.en: There it is. The first edition of the Yardian newspaper.
Hot off the presses!
Ugh. Hey, a simple "no, thanks" will do.
translation.ko: 이봐! 그냥 안 본다고 곱게 말로 해!

translation.en: Oh, my. Poor Jay.
So I live here?
You really don't remember, Jay?
Oh, you're talking to me? Sorry, Budge.
My name is Buzz.
That's what I said. Budge.
[Kumi] Surely, this will bring something back.
translation.ko: - 이걸 보면 뭔가 생각날 거야 - 너의 스케이트보드야

translation.en: It's your skateboard. You do all sorts of, um, crazy tricks on it.
translation.ko: - 이걸 보면 뭔가 생각날 거야 - 너의 스케이트보드야 너 그거 타고 멋진 묘기 많이 했잖아

translation.en: Uh, crazy like that?
No, much crazier.
Jay, Jay, I know you're in there somewhere, old friend.
translation.ko: 제이, 너 분명히 그 안에 있어 내 말이 들리면...

translation.en: [gasps`] If you can hear me, blink twice.
translation.ko: 제이, 너 분명히 그 안에 있어 내 말이 들리면... 눈을 두 번 깜빡거려!

translation.en: Uh, but I can speak.
[sobbing] No, it's no use! He's gone for good!
[clears throat] Look, I'm real sorry about your friend.
translation.ko: 너희 친구 일은 정말 안 됐어

translation.en: If I knew how to get him back, I would.
translation.ko: 방법을 알면 돌아오게 할 텐데 말이야

translation.en: Oh, maybe she will know.
Lucy!
What in the world are you doing here?
-Well, I read your newspaper, Walter. -[chuckles]
Uh, are you sure that's me?
Ah! Of course, it's you. It's in the news, after all.
Ah, I'm just a humble news slug.
I wanna help you, Jay.
But these bugs have already tried everything.
translation.ko: 하지만 이 친구들이 이미 모든 걸 다 해봤어요

translation.en: Maybe not everything.
[Lucy] This is where we begin.
All you need to do to restore your memory is go through a day in the life.
translation.ko: 기억을 다시 저장하기 위해 네가 할 건 평범한 하루를 사는 거야

translation.en: Jay's life.
[sighs] But that's the problem!
I don't remember what a Jay-day is.
translation.ko: 제이의 하루가 어떤지 기억이 안 난다고요

translation.en: [chuckling] Oh, you don't, but they do.
We will help you 'member us!
Oh, uh, I guess it's worth a try!
Do you remember anything?
Did it work? Do you remember who you are?
[stammering] Uh, I'm sorry.
Do I know you?
I'm so sorry. I've done all I can.
translation.ko: 정말 안타깝구나 할 수 있는 건 다 했어

translation.en: Let's sleep on it. He might be better in the morning.
translation.ko: 오늘은 그냥 자자 아침에 생각날 수도 있어

translation.en: [grunting] Good morning, bugs!
-[all gasp] -You remember us?
Uh, it's, um, uh, Barbs, right?
[panting] Jay! Not again!
Are you okay?
Oh. [chuckles] Yeah, Walter, just a bit of Jaction.
[gasps] He... He knows my name.
[grunts] Sure. Why wouldn't I?
And what exactly did you mean by, uh, "Jaction"?
[chuckles] You know, Jay plus action.
Uh, bugs, did I miss something?
Oh, yeah, um, you lost your memories when you broke the bug speed record.
translation.ko: 응, 넌 기억을 잃었었어 하지만 곤충 스피드 기록은 깼어!

translation.en: I did?
Wait, I broke the bug speed record?
translation.ko: 잠깐, 내가 곤충 스피드 기록을 깼다고?

translation.en: You, uh, don't remember that?
Uh-uh. And you know what that means?
We have to do it all over again!
It's Jaction time!
Just another day in the life.
[man] Oh, battery's running out.
Any closing remarks, Julia? Something to remember this day by?
translation.ko: 배터리가 다 됐네 인사할래, 줄리아? 오늘을 기억할 수 있는 말을 해
